title: Balancing Experiment
desc:
Post 1097
- If this card is rule 10ed, dont rule 10 it. Instead tell me this card was rule 10d and nerf one part of it somehow.
- When this card is nerfed, The post is also changed to reflect that nerf.
- When you play this card, discard five cards.
- When you play this card, all other players draw a card.
- When you play this card, look at another playerâ€™s hand.
- When you play this card, choose a player. They are frozen and their next turn is skipped.
- When you play this card, draw a <:gray:1107516393450127411> card and immediately play it no matter what.
